overview: A story of a night between an aged and a young woman who happens to be his ex finance. But how can that be true? The discussion becomes trustworthy while the woman complains for leaving her alone many years back but the arrogance of the man never acknowledge his mistakes rather he starts getting back all of his unfulfilled dreams that were left sometime. Next day another incident take place which reveals the crazy game between the two.
title: One Amongst Many
